name: Ambers BOOM
description: The game takes you to a prehistoric era, when the world was full of unknown dangers and difficulties. You will have to take on the role of a primitive, who finds a labyrinth with caves full of amber. Then your fellow tribesmen know about it and intend to take the treasures.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Процессор: Intel Pentium 4    1,8 GHz Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: DirectX 9 совместимая Место на диске: 90 MB
